meanings.definition: The encysted larval stage of a trematode parasite.
meanings.sent1: The metacercariae were found in the fish muscles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study metacercariae to understand parasite life cycles.
meanings.sent3: The metacercariae threw a party inside the cyst.
meanings.sent4: The metacercariae were like hidden treasures waiting to hatch.
meanings.sent5: The metacercariae resembled tiny time capsules of infection.
